data.description:
Welcome to Star Realm VR, travelers!

Here is some basic information about this app.

Star Realm VR is an innovative online social and home-building game. In this game, you can:

Build:

•	Craft unique floating islands

•	Decorate your personalized space

•	Sync building progress in real-time

•	Cultivate a fan base (akin to a 3D Discord Server)

•	Assemble your followers

•	Explore spaces crafted by other users


Social:

•	Make friends and engage in exciting conversations

•	Enjoy both text and voice chat (partially complete, ongoing)

•	Embrace your style with avatars 

•	Submit your avatars (ongoing)

•	Interact using delightful items & props


AI:

•	Immerse in conversations with Chat GPT 3.5-based AI

•	Produce simple AI 3D shapes

（Please understand  this is the Early Access version of the game, and we're constantly working to enhance your experience.）

Letter from Developer Vireal: 

Dear users,

We are a group of enthusiasts and developers of Social VR apps with a vision to blend the elements of “Minecraft” and “VR Chat” to deliver a multiplayer real-time building and social experience in XR.

Should you encounter any bugs, please feel free to drop an email to info@starrealmvr.com with [BUG] in the subject. Attaching screenshots and providing descriptions would be greatly appreciated! We aim to resolve them promptly.

Sincerely,
Team Vireal
